.
Required Elements for Notice of Proposed Adverse Action
Every notice of proposed adverse action must include the following elements:
a statement of the proposed decision, including proposed rates of payment for
all
affected periods of entitlement, including past periods for which an overpayment may or may not be created
the proposed effective date of the decision
information on the possible creation of an overpayment
detailed reasons for the proposed decision, and
the right to
present evidence
request a personal hearing, and
have representation.
Note
:Â  The attachment of forms to supplement the notice of proposed adverse action does not substitute for the information that must be included within the letter itself.
